pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Tests for the Vector of Means // This is a statistical tool interactive that provides multivariate statistical tests that are more powerful than traditional Hotelling T2 test and LRT (likelihood ratio test) for the vector of normal mean populations with and without contamination and non-normal populations (Henrique J. P. Alves Daniel F. Ferreira (2019) DOI: 10.1080/03610918.2019.1693596).
